(Lost GPS signal Title)Sorry, we have lost GPS signal. Please carry on with the tour as it does not affect the audio tour.
(Activation Lable)Please use one of the two methods to input your PIN and CODE
(Online Gps Signal lable)(The Device has a GPS signal)
(Offline Gps Signal lable)(The Device does not have a GPS signal)
(Activation Lable)Please use one of the two methods to input your PIN and CODE
(Online Gps Signal lable)(The Device has a GPS signal)
(Offline Gps Signal lable)(The Device does not have a GPS signal)
(No Network Labal)Sorry, there is no WiFi network to connect to. Please try again or use the offline option.
(Invalid Pin/Code Labal)Sorry, you have entered an incorrect PIN or CODE.\n Please try again. \n If the problem persists, please contact our helpline.
